  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

Assume we have 

1. test dataset `test`
1. model `xgb_base` which is a xgboost model
1. we want to save it in the directory `data` with name `my_pred.csv`

```{r eval=F}
phv_pred(test,xgb_base,dir='data',output_name='my_pred.csv')
```
